items.sentence: Hold the microphone a bit further away from your mouth.
The apple tree doesn't have much fruit on it this year.
From here to the train station takes about ten minutes.
French is only one of the languages that Tom can speak.
You aren't still thinking about what Tom said, are you?
I suspect that Tom and Mary were surprised to see John.
I suspect that Tom and Mary want us to help them today.
I suspect that Tom and Mary need to do that right away.
I can see Tom now, but I couldn't see him a minute ago.
There's no use shouting for help. Nobody will hear you.
